name: Samantha Snyder
coverLetter:
Hi there! I'm incredibly interested in the opportunity to be a cannabis trimmer. Although I have no prior experience in cannabis trimming, I am currently working as a farming intern and have experience working long hours, working outside and working with others; as well as a degree in Geology from Northern Arizona University. I have a passion for marijuana that I would love to eventually develop into a career. 
I would need housing accommodations with a cannabis trimming position, but I do have my own vehicle, valid drivers license and a marijuana workers permit. I would like a position that starts ASAP and ends around the holidays, but I am very flexible on my time frame. 
Please email me if you have any positions available. I'm confident I would make an excellent addition to your team.
contact: Please contact me at sjs393@nau.edu or call me at 623-606-0545
